Reviews.Title: Great picture and sound, but came in a "store mode" and nowhere to find how to fix this.
Reviews.Author: coolhair50
Reviews.Content: received the item pretty quickly.Great picture and sound, but once I finished the initial set-up and started watching the tv,the tv was asking for the initial set-up again after 30 minutes.After searching through internet, found out this item came in a "store-mode"(which resets its whole set-up and never saves them after certain time)other TVs (samsung, vizio, etc) have instructions on how to switching it to "home mode" online,but nowhere to be found regarding this TV.emailed seller and the Seiki company technical team.  Waiting for their responses.Would've given it 5 star if it wasn't for this problem.  Can't watch TV like this, having to set up channel and preferences every 30 minutes.UPDATE:It wasn't a store-mode but a defective item.seller wouldn't reply to my messages which I left several times.later found out that the seller don't accept returns on the items but give exchange.But wait, they don't even do that for TVs bigger than 27"For this TV, only way you can get it fixed is via Manufacturer's warranty per seller.To make the matter worse, the manufacturer's warranty doesn't cover for shipping in and out to get it repaired/exchangedwhich means $100~200 more out of your pocket in case you get a defective item as I did.So beware and if you still want to get this TV, hope you wouldn't get a damaged good like I did.UPDATE: (changed the rating to 3 from 1)Seiki released a firmware update.  People can download it from their site.This will fix the set-up screen popping up.  Yet, this still won't keep the aspect setting.Thus, only 3 stars...

Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy on Great T V!
Reviews.Author: Gerald A. Hazard
Reviews.Content: Seiki SC461TS Energy Star 46 Inch Diagonal 1080p LCD HDTV with 3 HDMII have had this tv for a week and so far it has been a great buy. The picture is crystal clear right out of the box! It has many adjustments for picture,sound, and brightness.the sound is exceptional for volume,(i am not a sound specialist like some) but you will have no trouble hearing this tv.Set up was very easy,it brought in 11 local channels with a little tv top antenna. Cable and netflix hooked up right off the HDMI cables. Just pleased all around with no gripes. If it holds up over time it will be a great buy! Comes with a very good HDMI cable(i was using an old one and could not get dish to come on until i used the HDMI cable that came with it)

Reviews.Title: So Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Consumer
Reviews.Content: I bought this product July 9,2012 and received it July 12,2012.I was very excited to get home and set it up, but after I put it all together and plugged it in then turned it on for the first time it turned right back off! So I called the manufacturer and instantly they told me I had a defective unit and I should send it back. I did but I was so upset and so disappointed that my new tv I payed 600.00 bucks on is broke. I wouldn't buy this product it to unreliable! I am really happy with amazon's return policy!

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: online_buyer
Reviews.Content: Great value for the money, picture quality is comparable to leading brands and it does excellent job for the price. Sound is extremely audible compared to other flat tvs, changed the mode to Music and turn surround option on for crispiness. I also had the same setup wizard pop up problem everytime I turned the TV on. Seiki support website has a firmware update to fix this issue, once done the update the setup wizard popup problem has gone. Works great now.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT Choice - Very (happily) surprised!
Reviews.Author: The Review Doctor
Reviews.Content: I was in a state of disbelief when I got this TV home and saw how many features it had for the price tag.The onscreen menu is easy and intuitive, the included speakers are so-so, but the picture is fantastic.The remote control is pretty basic, but we'll probably just program the TV into our universal and keep the original in the junk drawer.Hooked direct into the wall for cable gave us about 41 channels over the air.The picture quality is what you'd expect when straight from the wall, but if you run it from a cable box, DVD player, XBOX (excellent), or a receiver using High Def HDMI / Component cables - the picture quality rivals that of the major brands.I think that it's only a matter of time before the Seiki brand becomes the default USA brand for quality on a budget.Really great value for the money and we couldn't be happier with the purchase.For the record, it is replacing a 5 year old Panasonic Plasma and is going through a Pioneer A/V receiver.

Reviews.Title: Terrible picture
Reviews.Author: kaissi
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on black Friday, after reading plenty of reviews, I thought I need to give it a try. What a bad decisions I have made. this TV has the most horrible picture I have ever had on any TV, in fact I have my other TV Vizio(720p) is %100 better than this one. so I called both the seller and the Manufacture, both told me this was their best selling TV. I say NO WAY, don't buy it. I ended up sending it back to the seller and got a replacement one(but had to pay first for the 2nd one). 2nd one was exactly the same TERRIBLE, HORRIBLE VERY BAD PICTURE, so NOW I'm fighting both the seller and the Manufacture, Pray for me.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING FULL HD-TV!!!
Reviews.Author: perfectplex3
Reviews.Content: I Bought three of these Seiki 1080p LED TV's, extremely satisfied 110% recommend!!! i use it for multiple uses as a spare screen for my desktop, Xbox 360, and stunning blu-ray!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: TrapDead "TrapDead"
Reviews.Content: Only have the TV for 4 days, but so far couldn't be any more pleased. The picture is awesome. I didn't even change any of the settings, as it looked great right out of the box. Even the sound is very good. It goes pretty damn loud and doesn't sound tinny like my previous TV. The TV itself looks really nice. Seems like a much more expensive TV. Overall, just a really great TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Nino
Reviews.Content: I've had the tv for about two weeks now and I am very satisfied. I bought the tv for $399 at abc warehouse and was skeptical at first, but now I am very satisfied. For a tv on a budget, you can't beat it. The picture is sharp, and sound is OK. HD I would say looks 7-8/10. Video games look 8.5/10. 1080p videos look awesome, especially if using a 1080p/24 source. The only thing I find annoying is that it only has one component input. I would prefer at least two. Overall I am very satisfied and if it holds up, it will definitely be a good buy.
